nikes.description: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the b-ball OG that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: durably stitched overlays, clean finishes and the perfect amount of flash to make you shine.
The Nike Air Force 1 Shadow puts a playful twist on a classic b-ball design.Using a layered approach, doubling the branding and exaggerating the midsole, it highlights AF-1 DNA with a bold, new look.

Forget the hype. The Nike Tanjun brings you simplicity at its best. Made from at least 20% recycled content by weight, no detail is overlooked on this one. Lightweight. Airy. Comfortable. This shoe is all you need.

The Nike Metcon 7 is the gold standard for weight trainingâ€”even tougher and more stable than previous versions.We've also added React foam that ups the comfort to keep you ready for high-intensity cardio.Plus, a tab locks down your laces so you can forget about them coming untied when you're focused on your next PR.
